game.title: game title

line: The player begins their journey through an enchanted forest, encountering various creatures and magical creatures along the way.
Eventually, they reach an ancient castle and discover a powerful artifact that could threaten the balance of the world as they know it.

game.beginning: The player sets out on their quest through the enchanted forest.
game.ending: After restoring peace to the kingdom, the player ensures that the artifact remains in safe hands.
